# Maven target folder
target/

# IntelliJ IDEA
.idea/
*.iml
*.iws

# VS Code
.vscode/

.mvn/wrapper
.gitattributes
.gitignore
.gitignore.txt
mvnw
mvnw.cmd
# Logs
logs/
*.log

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Maven wrapper files (optional to ignore)
.mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.jar

# Local environment files
*.env

# Java specific
*.class
